@dev This sets the SLARegistry contract address and can only be called
 once

@dev This sets the SLARegistry contract address and can only be called
 once

requestSLI(uint256,address,bytes32).details: Creates a request to get a new SLI value for the given slo

params._periodId: the id for the given period
params._sla: the service level agreement we are verifying the SLI for
params._sloName: the name of the SLO for which SLI must be computed

setSLARegistry().details: This sets the SLARegistry contract address and can only be called once
